TopicTitle: Can Kethane mod show where we have both ore (EPL) AND kethane?

Articles.Content: I'm trying to land on a spot that has both on Minmus, and some of the patches only overlap by one or two spots. Is it possible to show patches that only have both? It's annoying to have to keep switching between to quintuple check before landing.

Also you know what would be cool? If Kethane wasn't random placement. As in, if Kethane was present in higher amounts in places like craters.. where things have impacted a planet/moon. Right now kethane and ore are placed randomly in patches and it doesn't really make sense.

How do you know it doesn't make sense? Perhaps Kethane is deposited on the surface by a high density stream of particles hitting the surface, or perhaps it grows there, or maybe its formation is not reliant upon any currently known geological process or from surface impacts. It might be someone simply PUT IT THERE!!!... DUN DUN DUUUUUUUN!!!!

*snicker* Har har!

I don't recall what it was named, but there is a mod out there which lets you target a landing site and possibly track it. It might be MechJeb... I don't recall. I think Scott used it in his Reusable Space Program videos though. I am fairly confident MechJeb has some functionality in this regard though. If you are able to target a landing site, I think that would help solve your problem - or at least you wouldn't need to swap back and forth between the two more than a few times (and certainly not whilst landing).

Well I can land pretty much wherever I want... I'm talking about a different map view that instead of showing either resource it shows spots that only have both.

Also... it might not have made sense due to me being very drunk when I wrote that.
